title: Assarii

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Stand guard outside a player's house, redirecting all their visitors to yourself.
- Draw energy from malice in a player. If they would show up as suspicious, you gain one basic autovest.
- Cast away your protection for a player, losing two basic autovests in order to invincibly heal them, purge them and give them one basic autovest.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You start with one basic autovest that blocks one attack.
- If you die, any autovests you granted will be removed.

desc:
Post 1748
*Bronze-winged colossus. It seems a wonder that he doesn't topple over from the weight of them.*
